org.smartfrog.tools.ant
Class Security

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      org.apache.tools.ant.types.DataType
          org.smartfrog.tools.ant.Security
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Security
extends org.apache.tools.ant.types.DataType

This is a datatype for the smartfrog tasks, one that takes security settings. It also contains the code to define those settings on the commandline. Date: 19-Apr-2004 Time: 16:46:05
